entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9543] Resultado global with a value of 19,244,000 is not equal to the combined total of Ganancia (pérdida) and Otro resultado global ( 18,463,000 + -781,000 ) with a value of 17,682,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Resultado global : -3 Decimals of Ganancia (pérdida) : -3 Decimals of Otro resultado global : -3
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es.zip/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es/reports/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es.xhtml 10771

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 05 - Estado de flujos de efectivo [resumen] but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInLoansAndAdvancesToBanks, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:RepaymentsOfBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForUndistributedProfitsOfAssociates, ifrs-full:RepaymentsOfBondsNotesAndDebentures, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForAmortisationExpense, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForFinanceIncome, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromIssueOfBondsNotesAndDebentures, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForInterestExpense, metrovacesa:ResultadoConsolidadoAntesDeImpuestos, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAccountReceivable, metrovacesa:IncorporacionALasExistenciasDeGastosFinancieros, metrovacesa:OtrosFlujosDeEfectivoDeLasActividadesDeExplotacion, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromCurrentBorrowings, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForInterestIncome, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInOtherLiabilities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForProvisions, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInInventories, ifrs-full:DividendsPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForFinanceCosts All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Resultado [resumen] but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ServicesExpense, ifrs-full:ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:ShorttermEmployeeBenefitsExpense, ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax, ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromContinuingOperations, ifrs-full:OtherOperatingIncomeExpense, ifrs-full:IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Estado de situación financiera [resumen] but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:TreasuryShares, metrovacesa:OtrosInstrumentosDePatrimonioNeto, ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities, ifrs-full:OtherReserves, ifrs-full:OtherEquityInterest, ifrs-full:Equity, metrovacesa:AjustesPorCambiosDeValor, ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings, ifrs-full:IssuedCapital, ifrs-full:SharePremium All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of -249,879,000 reported in the network role http://metrovacesa.com/xbrl/2021/roles/EstadoDeSituacionFinancieraResumen should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 249,879,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://metrovacesa.com/xbrl/2021/roles/EstadoDeCambiosEnElPatrimonioNetoResumen. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es.zip/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es/reports/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es.xhtml 10771
